targets.expr: max by(instance, device, model_family, model_name, serial_number, form_factor, protocol, firmware_version, interface) (last_over_time(smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device"}[$__range]))
sum by(instance, device) ((smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device"}) or last_over_time(smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device"}[$__range]) * 0)

max by(device) (last_over_time(smartctl_device_temperature{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device", temperature_type="op_limit_max"}[$__range]))
or
max by(device) (last_over_time(smartctl_device_temperature{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device", temperature_type="critical_limit_max"}[$__range]))
or
max by(device) (last_over_time(smartctl_device_temperature{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device", temperature_type="drive_trip"}[$__range]))

max by(device) (rate(smartctl_device_bytes_written{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device"}[$__rate_interval]))
or
max by(device) (rate(mined:smartctl_device_bytes_written{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device"}[$__rate_interval]))

max by(device) (rate(smartctl_device_bytes_read{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device"}[$__rate_interval]))
or
max by(device) (rate(mined:smartctl_device_bytes_read{instance=~"$instance", device=~"$device"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: Contains the number of occurrences where the controller detected an unrecovered data integrity error. Errors such as uncorrectable ECC, CRC checksum failure, or LBA tag mismatch are included in this field
panels.title: new media errors

panels.description: scaling is inversed, negative values means temperature is above limit
panels.title: temperature to limit delta

panels.description: scaling is inversed, negative values means temperature is above limit
panels.title: temperature to critical limit delta
Critical warnings for state of controller

list.definition: query_result(group by(model_name) ((smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance", interface=~"$interface", invalid=$only_present})) or group by(model_name) (last_over_time(smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance", interface=~"$interface", invalid!=$only_present}[$__range])))
list.label: Model Name
list.name: model_name

query.query: query_result(group by(model_name) ((smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance", interface=~"$interface", invalid=$only_present})) or group by(model_name) (last_over_time(smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance", interface=~"$interface", invalid!=$only_present}[$__range])))

list.definition: query_result(sum by(device) ((smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance", interface=~"$interface", model_name=~"$model_name", invalid=$only_present})) or sum by(device) (last_over_time(smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance", interface=~"$interface", model_name=~"$model_name", invalid!=$only_present}[$__range])))
list.name: device

query.query: query_result(sum by(device) ((smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance", interface=~"$interface", model_name=~"$model_name", invalid=$only_present})) or sum by(device) (last_over_time(smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance", interface=~"$interface", model_name=~"$model_name", invalid!=$only_present}[$__range])))
